lead_paragraph: Marta Bastianelli of Italy won the women’s road race title on a breakaway yesterday at the world championships in Stuttgart, Germany.The defending champion Marianne Vos of the Netherlands won the sprint for second place, and Giorgia Bronzini of Italy captured the bronze. Bastianelli, 20, finished the 83-mile race in 3 hours 46 minutes 34 seconds. She broke away from the pack with about nine miles to go. Vos finished six seconds behind.
